posts.content:
Yes I know it’s not a split but... need to find a NICE T25 panel, single or double cab for a newcomer to the scene that can’t afford a lot. Be nice to help them out so I thought the more eyes on the case the better! If you know of anything that me be worth a look I’d be most grateful if you could come back to me. I just want the initial experience of owning a VW to be enjoyable, not a nightmare for them! Drinks are on me if anyone fids the right vehicle!

Thanks all

Rikki.

Hi Rikki,

I know of a couple, will drop you a text.

James

Sent from my SM-G973F using Tapatalk

I'll forward you a pic of 1 if you want, p.m me ya number and i'll wottapp you a pic of the scooby doo mystery machine. Its a good 1 too , I'm sure its an early air cooled
12 month mot 98K MILES
